name: tm22
effect: Teaches SolarBeam to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches SolarBeam to a compatible Pokémon.

flavor_text.diamond-pearl: A two-turn attack. The user gathers light, then blasts a bundled beam on the second turn.
flavor_text.platinum: A two-turn attack. The user gathers light, then blasts a bundled beam on the second turn.
flavor_text.heartgold-soulsilver: A two-turn attack. The user gathers light, then blasts a bundled beam on the second turn.
